name: INSPIRE
description:
It's the year 2042.

You are a B.E.C. A Bionically Enhanced Collector, employed by Earth’s global employment agency, Collector Corp.

Your life is on the verge of a life-changing transformation with the arrival of the Sentians, a mysterious extraterrestrial race. Will you become the unexpected hero that Earth desperately needs?

ALIEN WARFARE



Fight head-on with your bionic abilities, or target enemies from a distance with a wide range of customizable weapons.

EXPLORE FUTURISTIC EARTH


Discover all sorts of mysteries during your adventure in a stylized semi-open world. From a beautiful forest to a dark crater or an icy mountain. The world is yours to explore.

BACKPACK COMPANION


You're not alone in your adventure, you have a dynamic transformable backpack that can transform in many ways, including a Jetpack!

DYNAMIC SEASONS


The world of INSPIRE has a dynamic seasonal system. Find out how the world changes each day and night.

BATTLE SYSTEM


Your actions influence all kinds of dynamic events during your playtime, tracked by the game’s Battle System.

THE SOUND OF INSPIRE

Enjoy an epic electronic soundtrack, created by Husman.
